definition: to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店員警告我說開門前最好先敲敲門，以便把它們嚇跑。

sentences.english: Also noisemakers are thought to be used at parties as a way of scaring away the evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在生日會上發出的歡呼聲能夠嚇跑邪惡的幽靈。

sentences.english: Entrepeneurs are afraid of doing it. They're worried they're going to scare off future investors.
sentences.chinese: 創業者們害怕這麼做，可能會嚇跑未來的投資者。

sentences.english: The courgette struck the bear on the head, scaring it away
sentences.chinese: 這就是擊中黑熊頭部，並把它嚇跑的西葫蘆。

sentences.english: The sting of her tongue has scared away many pursuers .
sentences.chinese: 她出語傷人已經嚇跑了許多追求者。

sentences.english: But the litigation with Corbis scared them away.
sentences.chinese: 不過與Corbis的訴訟還是將他們嚇跑了。

sentences.english: Hardly had the leopard cat been scared away when the tiger heard the roar and came.
sentences.chinese: 驅剛剛被虎嘯嚇跑，可是老虎卻聞聲趕到了。

sentences.english: But, second, Chinaisbecoming relaxed about spooking foreign investors.
sentences.chinese: 但是，第二，中國並不擔心會嚇跑國外的投資者。

sentences.english: Keeping too much eye-contact might creep people out.
sentences.chinese: 然而過多的眼神交流也許會把人嚇跑哦。

sentences.english: But his loud voice scared the little mouse away.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的大嗓門已把小老鼠嚇跑了。

sentences.english: They think they can scare away the soldiers because they have a couple of big guns.
sentences.chinese: 他們還以爲有幾門大傢伙就可以把士兵都嚇跑。

sentences.english: The policemans approach scared the thief away.
sentences.chinese: 警察走過來，把小偷嚇跑了。

sentences.english: he would fly low, intentionally backfiring the plane and frightening away the hunters.
sentences.chinese: 他會飛得很低，故意讓飛機尾部噴火，嚇跑獵手。

sentences.english: She follows me everywhere I go and her presence scares all the fishes.
sentences.chinese: 我走到哪裏它就跟到哪裏，把魚兒都嚇跑了。

sentences.english: Some fans of the "beautiful game" are balking at the cost of long-haul flights and peak-price accommodations.
sentences.chinese: 一些球迷被長途飛機的票價及高昂的住宿費嚇跑了。

sentences.english: Don't speak so rudely, or you'll scare the customers away.
sentences.chinese: 說話別這麼粗魯，不然會嚇跑顧客的。
